title: Rotating game mode
body: Is it possible to get information about what's going on with One for All ? In Ask Riot they said that they are working on it, but it is now almost 1 year since we had this mode. Maybe more information about rotating game mode in general would be helpful, like what is the favourit mode.

replies.body: We don't have info on upcoming rotating game modes until it's announced.  :/  Keep an eye out for patch notes, there will be a section for scheduled rotating game modes to try and give as much heads up as possible!
